effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

name: "Bullet-Proof" Vestplate
description: See the bullet holes? Dat's da proof.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crimson Aspirant's Plate Handguards

spells.description:
Use: Summon Pitbot Geardo to assist you for 5 sec, coating nearby enemies with rancid motor oil for additional threat. Geardo ensures you take the blame.

Geardo departs explosively to deal 888,439 Fire damage split between nearby enemies, increased by 15% if recently oiled. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.2 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 2,987 Haste for 12 sec.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
